name: Game Day Nutrition Plan

meals.notes: Light, easily digestible carbs for quick energy without feeling heavy

meals.name: Post-Game Recovery Meal
meals.notes: High protein for muscle recovery with carbs to replenish glycogen

meals.name: Recovery Dinner
meals.notes: Nutrient-dense meal to support overnight recovery and sleep
